content:
RenderType Enum

Definition

Specifies how the image of the chart will be rendered.

In this Article

public enum RenderType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
RenderType

Remarks

The RenderType enumeration represents the way in which the chart image will be rendered, and is used in conjunction with the RenderType property.

Fields

BinaryStreaming

Chart is streamed directly to the client.
ImageMap

Chart is rendered as an image map.
ImageTag

Chart is rendered using an HTML image tag.
